mapper.select: SELECT P.PNAME, P.PCTYIMG, P.PPRICE, O.OCNT, O.ODATE, P.PCODE, U.UCODE FROM ORDERS O, USERS U , PRODUCT P WHERE O.UCODE = U.UCODE AND P.PCODE = O.PCODE AND O.UCODE = #{uCode}
SELECT C.*, U.UNICK FROM COMMUNITY C, USERS U WHERE C.UCODE = U.UCODE AND C.UCODE = #{uCode} ORDER BY MCODE DESC
SELECT Q.*, U.UNAME FROM QNA Q, USERS U WHERE Q.UCODE = U.UCODE AND Q.UCODE = #{uCode} ORDER BY QCODE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE QNA SET QCONTENT = #{qContent} WHERE QCODE = #{qCode}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM REVIEW ORDER BY RCODE DESC

SELECT REVIEW.RCODE, REVIEW.UCODE, REVIEW.PCODE, REVIEW.RSTAR, REVIEW.RDATE, REVIEW.RTITLE, REVIEW.RCONTENT, PRODUCT.PNAME FROM REVIEW LEFT OUTER JOIN PRODUCT ON REVIEW.PCODE = PRODUCT.PCODE WHERE REVIEW.UCODE = #{uCode} ORDER BY REVIEW.RCODE DESC
